thread.title_full: Quality Health Associates of North Dakota Chooses InterQual for State Medicaid Reviews

title: Quality Health Associates of North Dakota Chooses InterQual for State Medicaid Reviews
text:
Quality Health Associates of North Dakota Chooses InterQual for State Medicaid Reviews [October 05, 2015] Tweet 
Today McKesson Health Solutions announced that Quality Health Associates of North Dakota has signed its first long-term agreement to use InterQual Â® for all Medicaid utilization and quality reviews in North Dakota. Quality Health Associates is a partner in the Great Plains QIN (Quality Innovation Network) which serves as the CMS QIN-QIO for North Dakota, South Dakota, Nebraska, and Kansas. This Smart News Release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151005005916/en/ 
Quality Health Associates has licensed all of the InterQual Level of Care Criteria and Behavioral Health Criteria , as well as InterQual Procedures, Imaging, DME, and Molecular Diagnostics Care Planning Criteria . Quality Health Associates also invested in InterQual training , a program taught by McKesson's clinical educational consultants, all of whom are Registered Nurses with experience in case management and utilization management. 
InterQual evidence-based criteria help improve clinical decision-making across the medical and behavioral health continuums of care. The InterQual clinical development team synthesizes the most current, best evidence into a fully referenced decision support tool that is reviewed and updated annually. InterQual's development process, honed over nearly 40 years, is founded on rigorous review of the literature, and includes extensive peer review by practicing clinical experts across the United States. 
For more information on McKesson Health Solutions, please visit our website , hear from our experts at MHSdialogue , and follow us on Twitter ( News - Alert ) at @McKesson_MHS .
